name: Look Now
description:
You get one look to memorize the maze before you blow out the light and help the little flame guy re-light the torch and progress to  the next room.

Controls:

 WASD or Directional Arrows to move.

Space to blow out the light.

X to reload level.

And if you really need to "C" 

As for the theme Less is More, what is less than not being able to see the game?

All artwork created from scratch. 

2 royalty free sfx used. 

Try closing your eyes as well it kind of helps.
